questions.question: Write a Django view to handle user login using session-based authentication.
Create a Flask API to handle user registration and return a JWT token.
Implement a Random Forest model in Python to classify the Iris dataset.
Create a Python script to preprocess text and train a sentiment analysis model.
Build a React component that renders a list of items and allows sorting.
Create a Vue.js component that fetches data from an API and displays it in a table.
Write a Dockerfile to containerize a Flask app and deploy it using Kubernetes.
Create a GitHub Actions workflow to build and deploy a Node.js app to AWS.
